text: Lakewood is a city in Ohio, near Cleveland. It is in the northeastern area of the state. In the 2020 United States Census, 50,942 people lived there. ==Government== Lakewood is led by a mayor and a city council. The people in Lakewood vote to choose the mayor and city council. There are seven people in the city council. ==Geography== Lakewood is about 6 miles (9.7 km) west of Cleveland. The city has a total area of 6.69 square miles (17.33 km2). Famous people from Lakewood include Teri Garr. ==References== Category:Cities in Ohio
title: Lakewood, Ohio
